column1: Bumping.That's fair enough. Celebrations can still take place as family. Whiskey and snacks orderedNot sure I'd want to be jammed into a crowded pub. That's worse than an outdoor crowd!Edited: 2:56 pm, March 10, 2020
It won’t stop people heading out to the many bars & pubs throughout the town
Get out there and enjoy yourselves, going a bit too far with all the cancellations if you ask me, just my opinion.
find it a bit strange that parades, matches etc. all being cancelled yet Cheltenham is still going as planned.
Tony, I was as surprised as you.Kesh
Agree Tony, bit like the football ... some behind closed doors and some not .... hope it all sorts itself out soon.
I have cancelled my trip to Bosnia already, once they stopped the ticket sales it was only going one way.
No plans off the Island at this time.Kesh
